translation.fr: Son père était un psychopathe.

translation.en: So he would come in and beat the shit out of his wife
translation.fr: Il arrivait et tabassait sa femme

translation.en: and also the youngest one but never touched my mother,
translation.fr: et aussi le plus jeune, mais il n'a jamais touché ma mère,et c'était une torture pour elle.

translation.en: and that was the worst torture for her of all.
translation.fr: mais il n'a jamais touché ma mère,et c'était une torture pour elle.

translation.en: So I think, by the time she was eight, nine years old,
translation.fr: Donc je crois qu'à huit ou neuf ans,

translation.en: she wouldn't say a word to him.
translation.fr: elle ne lui disait plus un mot.

translation.en: 1932, the height of the Depression, he just ups and leaves.
translation.fr: En 1932, au pic de la Grande Dépression,il les a abandonnés.

translation.en: He doesn't say anything, doesn't tell them he's leaving.
translation.fr: Il n'a rien dit,il n'a pas dit qu'il partait.

translation.en: In the middle of the night, he books. He's gone.
translation.fr: Au milieu de la nuit,d'un coup, il est parti.

translation.en: Forty years later, he tried to, um, contact my mother,
translation.fr: Quarante ans après,il a essayé de contacter ma mère,

translation.en: but my mother is hard-core. Forget it. I don't think she answered the letter.
translation.fr: mais ma mère est intransigeante.Je pense qu'elle ne lui a jamais répondu.

translation.en: She had this thing with men, for obvious reasons.
translation.fr: Elle avait un problème avec les hommes,pour des raisons évidentes.

translation.en: Every night at dinner, she'd give a tirade about men.
translation.fr: Tous les soirs, au diner,elle faisait une tirade sur les hommes.

translation.en: "Men are this, men are that." I couldn't really disagree with her.
translation.fr: "Les hommes sont ci, sont ça."Elle n'avait pas tort.

translation.en: My poor father had to be the cheerleader for this.
translation.fr: Mon pauvre père se devait de la soutenir.

translation.en: -[Jonah] What would he do? -He'd say, "Yeah, she's right."
translation.fr: - Que faisait-il ?- Il disait, "Oui, elle a raison."

translation.en: -[Jonah laughs] -"Men are terrible."
translation.fr: "Les hommes sont horribles."

translation.en: It didn't occur to me until I was about 13, 14. "Shit, I'm a man. Hmm."
translation.fr: Je n'y ai pensé qu'à 13 ou 14 ans."Merde, je suis un homme."

translation.en: But she couldn't get over that, even 50 years later.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas surmonté ça,même 50 ans après.

translation.en: -Couldn't get over it. -[Jonah] She's stuck in the Maze.
translation.fr: - Non.- Elle est coincée dans le labyrinthe.

translation.en: She's stuck in the Maze for 40 years, 50 years, yeah.
translation.fr: Elle est coincée dedansdepuis 40 ans, 50 ans.

translation.en: The Maze always involves other people.
translation.fr: Le labyrinthe impliquetoujours d’autres personnes.

translation.en: It's the product of Part X,
translation.fr: Il est le produit de la Partie X,

translation.en: because Part X wants fairness.
translation.fr: parce que la Partie X exige la justice.

translation.en: A classic example
translation.fr: Un exemple classique,

translation.en: is when somebody only wants to think and talk about another person.
translation.fr: quand quelqu'un ne veut penseret parler que d'une personne.

translation.en: What you're telling yourself is,
translation.fr: Tu te dis,

translation.en: "I'll move past this once they make up for whatever it is,
translation.fr: "Je passerai à autre chose quandcette personne se sera fait pardonner,

translation.en: being angry at me, cheating."
translation.fr: "pour s'être énervéou pour m'avoir trompé."

translation.en: It doesn't matter what.
translation.fr: Peu importe la raison.

translation.en: You feel they've mistreated you, and your quest for fairness puts your life on hold.
translation.fr: Tu te sens lésé et tu mets ta viesur pause le temps d'obtenir justice.

translation.en: Time is fleeting, and we don't have time for that bullshit.
translation.fr: Le temps passe vite, il ne faut pasle gâcher pour ces conneries.

translation.en: [Jonah] I feel like I spent my whole fucking life in the Maze.
translation.fr: J'ai l'impression d'avoirpassé ma vie dans le labyrinthe.

translation.en: Being stuck on not being paid back for something I was viewing as unfair
translation.fr: J'étais bloquésur un sentiment d'injustice.

translation.en: wasted hours, days, months, years of my life that I can't get back.
translation.fr: J'ai gâché des heures, des jours,des mois, des années de ma vie.

translation.en: So how could she have gotten out of the Maze?
translation.fr: Comment aurait-elle pusortir du labyrinthe ?

translation.en: [Stutz] Here's the thing. The average person wants to get paid back.
translation.fr: Une personne ordinaire veutrécupérer ce qu'elle pense mériter.

translation.en: They want everything to be fair. They want everything to be balanced.
translation.fr: Elle veut que les chosessoient justes, équilibrées.

translation.en: But you're not gonna get it from them.
translation.fr: Mais les autres n'offrent pas ça.

translation.en: The way you feel you're getting paid,
translation.fr: Pour avoir l'impression d'obtenir justice,

translation.en: the way you feel things are being rebalanced,
translation.fr: l'impression queles choses se rééquilibrent,

translation.en: is to get your satisfaction from the exercise itself.
translation.fr: il faut réussir à tirer satisfactionde l'exercice en lui-même.

translation.en: That's called Active Love.
translation.fr: Il s'appelle l'Amour Actif.

translation.en: So close your eyes
translation.fr: Ferme les yeux

translation.en: and imagine you're surrounded by a universe completely made out of love.
translation.fr: et imagine-toi entouréd'un univers fait d'amour.

translation.en: I know it sounds nuts, but just shut the fuck up. Do what I tell you.
translation.fr: Je sais ça a l'air débile,mais ferme-la et fais ce que je dis.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Don't prejudge it and see what happens.
translation.fr: Sois ouvert et vois ce qui se passe.

translation.en: Let me try to define it.
translation.fr: Je vais être plus précis.

translation.en: It's just… It's a world that's almost dense with loving energy.
translation.fr: C'est un monde remplid'une énergie faite d'amour.

translation.en: Feel yourself taking in all the love in the universe,
translation.fr: Prends tout l'amour de cet univers,

translation.en: and gently, but firmly, place all of it in your heart.
translation.fr: et doucement, mais fermement,place-le dans ton cœur.

translation.en: Right at that moment, you're the principal leader of love
translation.fr: À ce moment précis,tu es le chef de l'amour

translation.en: in the whole universe.
translation.fr: de tout l'univers.

translation.en: What you do is you want to see the person you're angry at,
translation.fr: Puis tu vois la personnecontre qui tu es énervé,

translation.en: that you hate, that you despise,
translation.fr: que tu détestes, que tu méprises

translation.en: and you send all this love you've concentrated
translation.fr: et tu envoies tout l'amour que tu as réuni

translation.en: towards the other person.
translation.fr: à cette personne.

translation.en: You hold nothing back. You give everything.
translation.fr: Tu ne gardes rien. Tu donnes tout.

translation.en: You feel, not just see,
translation.fr: Tu ne fais pas que regarder,

translation.en: you feel your love enter the other person's body.
translation.fr: tu sens ton amour atteindrele corps de cette personne.

translation.en: It's very important.
translation.fr: C'est important.

translation.en: For a minute, you become one.
translation.fr: Pour un instant, vous n'êtes qu'un.

translation.en: At that point, you feel like, "If I can become one with this bastard,
translation.fr: À ce stade, tu te dis,"Si je ne fais qu'un avec cet enfoiré,

translation.en: I can become one with anybody."
translation.fr: "je peux ne faire qu'unavec n'importe qui."

translation.en: And that's the sense of prowess, almost of mastery.
translation.fr: Et c'est là une prouesse,c'est presque du génie.

translation.en: People say, "Well, you're asking me to love somebody I hate."
translation.fr: Les gens disent, "Vous me demandezd'aimer quelqu'un que je déteste."

translation.en: It's not a way to forgive somebody. It's not for the other person.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un acte de pardon.Ce n'est pas pour l'autre.

translation.en: It's to make you feel whole and then free you from the Maze.
translation.fr: C'est pour te sentir entieret te libérer du labyrinthe.

translation.en: Then you can move forward.
translation.fr: Et ainsi, tu peux avancer.

translation.en: So do you wanna be right, or do you wanna create something?
translation.fr: Donc, tu veux avoir raisonou créer quelque chose ?

translation.en: That's what it always comes down to.
translation.fr: C'est ce qui compte.

translation.en: Life is moving forward.
translation.fr: La vie, c'est avancer.

translation.en: If you want to waste your time playing games over here, you can,
translation.fr: Si tu veux perdre ton temps, tu peux,

translation.en: but you can't get those days, hours back.
translation.fr: mais tu ne pourras pas récupérer ce temps.

translation.en: When she got older, she became a community organizer,
translation.fr: Plus âgée, elle est devenueorganisatrice communautaire

translation.en: and she was awesome.
translation.fr: et elle était géniale.

translation.en: If you asked her, "What was your job?" she would say, "Organizing rent strikes."
translation.fr: Si on lui demandait ce qu'elle faisait, elle disait, "J'organise des grèvesdes loyers. Je gagne ma vie comme ça."

translation.en: "That's what I do for a living." She wasn't scared of anybody.
translation.fr: elle disait, "J'organise des grèvesdes loyers. Je gagne ma vie comme ça." Elle n'avait peur de personne.

translation.en: In fact, the mayor of New York sees my mother and says, "Wait a minute."
translation.fr: D'ailleurs, le maire de New Yorkl'a vue et a dit, "Attendez.

translation.en: "I will not proceed with this negotiation until Rosalie Stutz leaves."
translation.fr: "Je n'entame pas les négociationstant que Rosalie Stutz est là."

translation.en: [laughs] And they had to make her leave. He was scared to death of her.
translation.fr: Ils ont dû la faire partir.Il avait très peur d'elle.

translation.en: [Jonah] She turned her tragedy with men into a superpower
translation.fr: Elle a transformé son rapportaux hommes afin de ne plus les craindre

translation.en: of not being scared of them and getting great good done.
translation.fr: Elle a transformé son rapportaux hommes afin de ne plus les craindre et de faire le bien.

translation.en: Yeah, she did.

translation.en: [Jonah] How do you think that affects you,

translation.en: having your mom hate men and you being a man?

translation.en: I can feel everybody waiting for the answer,

translation.en: but I don't know if I know exactly the answer.
translation.fr: mais je ne sais passi j'en ai vraiment une.

translation.en: I know one thing for sure. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Mais je suis sûr d'une chose.

translation.en: It made me insecure around women. I mean, that's a no-brainer.
translation.fr: Ça m'a rendu anxieuxavec les femmes. À l'évidence.

translation.en: It was like there was no pathway inside me
translation.fr: Je n'avais pasce qu'il fallait au fond de moi,

translation.en: that could step to a woman and feel safe.

translation.en: I guess that's the best way to say it.

translation.en: [Jonah] Because you think your mom's reaction to you was to, like, cut you down,

translation.en: and so you couldn't see a way with women where you could feel safe?

translation.en: Yeah. It wasn't even on my list of expectations.

translation.en: It's not that much of an issue now.

translation.en: I'll tell you one thing, I'd be a much better partner now than I was years ago.

translation.en: Although that's a very low bar.

translation.en: [chuckling] That's a very low bar.

translation.fr: As-tu déjà contournéle mur construit par ta mère

translation.en: yeah, once.

translation.en: [chuckles] As crazy as that might sound.

translation.fr: En gros,

translation.en: It's funny. You know, today I hardly…

translation.en: Wow, that's really good. [Jonah] Yeah, you're not even shaking at all.
translation.fr: - Waouh, c'est pas mal.- Oui, tu ne trembles quasiment pas.

translation.en: Would you be willing to follow me around? Because you seem to be helping.

translation.fr: Je te laisserais… Tu restes avec moi jusqu'à 19 ou 20htous les jours, puis je te libère…

translation.en: till about 7:00, 8:00 at night, then you're free--

translation.en: -Stay on track, bro. -Thank you.

translation.en: -[Jonah] I know what you're doing. -Thank you.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.fr: Oui.

translation.en: but do you ever think that can be a crutch

translation.en: to not just make a decision that would be scary emotionally?

translation.en: Uh, yes, 100%.
I think that crazy part of me--

translation.en: It takes whatever is happening and uses it to prove its point.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.

translation.en: [Jonah] You know, I think my big fear with, uh, romantic relationships,
translation.fr: Tu sais, je crois que ma plus grande peurconcernant les relations sentimentales…

translation.en: what I'm learning is, is, like, the only way
translation.fr: Ce dont je me rends compte,c'est que le seul moyen

translation.en: for them to succeed is for you to be completely vulnerable.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.fr: Oui.

translation.en: Well, you've definitely succeeded in that.

translation.en: I can't tell you, in the last, let's say, three minutes,

translation.en: how many jokes I've had to repress.

translation.en: [Jonah] I get it.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.fr: Oui.

translation.en: you will call her

translation.en: So I think, now that I'm talking about it,

translation.en: I think, unconsciously,
translation.fr: je crois qu'inconsciemment,

translation.en: Yes. That's correct.

translation.en: I grew up in Manhattan, so I was used to going out at night.
translation.fr: J'ai grandi à Manhattan,donc je sortais beaucoup le soir.

translation.en: By the time I was 21, 22, we would go out at least one out of every two nights.
translation.fr: À 21, 22 ans,je sortais au moins un soir sur deux.

translation.en: It was Friday. I was supposed to meet these two women at some bar downtown.
translation.fr: C'était un vendredi. Je devaisrejoindre deux femmes dans un bar.

translation.en: I said, "Great, I'll be down there in an hour."
translation.fr: J’ai dit,"Super, j’arrive dans une heure."

translation.en: And I had been taking a nap.
translation.fr: J'ai fait une sieste.

translation.en: I went back to sleep. I said, "Let me just continue this nap for 20 minutes,
translation.fr: Je me suis couché. Je me suis dit,"Je dors encore 20 minutes,

translation.en: then I'll take a cab downtown."
translation.fr: "puis je prends un taxi pour le bar."

translation.en: I woke up Monday morning.
translation.fr: Je me suis réveillé le lundi matin.

translation.en: And I said, "I am really fucked. Something is terribly wrong."
translation.fr: Je me suis dit, "Je suis déglingué.Il y a un vrai problème."

translation.en: Complete exhaustion. Like an exhaustion so deep…
translation.fr: Un épuisement total.Une fatigue si intense…

translation.en: Let me put it this way.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire.

translation.en: If I had to go to the cleaners, right across the street from my house,
translation.fr: Quand je devais aller au pressing,juste en face de chez moi,

translation.en: I would have to think, "Okay, can I do this or not?"
translation.fr: je me demandais,"J'en suis capable ou pas ?

translation.en: "Do I have the… the strength to do it?"
translation.fr: "Ai-je la force de le faire ?"

translation.en: But this was not me. I was, like, a very hyperactive person.
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas moi. J'étais hyperactif.

translation.en: So then I went to a neurologist.
translation.fr: Donc je suis allé voir un neurologue.

translation.en: In one meeting, he told me, "Oh, you have cervical stenosis,
translation.fr: Il m'a dit,"Vous avez une sténose cervicale,

translation.en: you need immediate surgery, and you have Parkinson's disease."
translation.fr: "il faut vous opérer,et vous avez Parkinson."

translation.fr: Maintenant,

translation.en: well, it speaks for itself. [chuckles]

translation.fr: Penses-tu que les problèmes de santépeuvent conduire à la solitude ?

translation.en: That's right. That's exactly right.

translation.en: -Oh. -Sorry. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Désolé.

translation.en: "We'll get above this, and the sun will be out."

translation.en: If you can't break through, you think it's a very bad day.

translation.en: So the Grateful Flow wants to choose the positives.

translation.en: Part X wants you to have the negative flow, so it'll create the cloud up there

translation.en: so you can't see the sun.

translation.en: The question becomes, "How do you penetrate the cloud?"
translation.fr: La question devient donc,comment traverser le nuage ?

translation.en: And the answer is, "With gratefulness."
translation.fr: Avec de la gratitude.

translation.en: It gives you the sensation, the feeling,
translation.fr: Ça te donne l'impression

translation.en: that there's always something up there positive even if you can't see it at all.

translation.en: But you have to have a mechanism. That's where the tool comes in.

translation.en: things you're grateful for.

translation.en: The smaller the thing, the better,

translation.en: because it forces you to concentrate gratefulness.
translation.fr: ça te force àte concentrer sur la gratitude.

translation.en: You wanna do it nice and slow. You want to feel the gratefulness.

translation.en: Good.

translation.en: that you're going to create another grateful thought, but you don't.
translation.fr: imagine une autre pensée reconnaissante,mais arrête-la.

translation.en: and as it gets stronger and stronger, you feel taken over by it.

translation.en: That's the Grateful Flow. That was excellent. Did you feel anything?

translation.en: I felt everything kind of just… slow down.

translation.en: -[Stutz] Mm-hmm. -Like in a sense of comfort.

translation.en: [Stutz] That's pretty good.

translation.en: The key is not saying the same things over and over that you're grateful for.

translation.en: You wanna make it a creative act.

translation.en: When you have to dig and work on it to find these things,
translation.fr: Quand tu dois faire un effortpour créer ces choses,

translation.en: that process itself will change your mood.

translation.en: The classic time to use it is when your thoughts are out of control.

translation.en: The worst thing to do is argue with them.

translation.en: 'Cause its effect on you is terrible, and it does nothing for you.

translation.en: But gratefulness is not just, "I'm lucky somebody helped me," or whatever.

translation.fr: La gratitude c'est un état dans lequeltu dois être le plus souvent possible,

translation.en: as often as you possibly can be in it, because it's the state that connects you…
translation.fr: La gratitude c'est un état dans lequeltu dois être le plus souvent possible, parce que cet état te connecte…

translation.en: It's the state that breaks through the cloud.

translation.en: And once you're up there, you're in a different world.

translation.en: What Part X does is to say you shouldn't be grateful. It says, "You got screwed."

translation.en: "You're a victim. You didn't get enough."

translation.en: I don't talk to you about your Parkinson's a ton.

translation.en: my own fears around that stuff.

translation.en: um, because I continue every day to make adjustments,
translation.fr: parce que je faisde nouveaux ajustements tous les jours,

translation.en: and a lot of them are very helpful.

translation.en: I think about the future,

translation.en: but mostly, my biggest fear is not getting enough done before I die.

translation.en: -Hmm. -'Cause I got so much--

translation.en: It's definitely, like, the most shook-up I've ever been.

translation.fr: C'est très rare dans la viede pouvoir capter

translation.en: at the climactic, you know, most important moment.

translation.en: Whether it's in a week or a year, it doesn't matter.
translation.fr: Une semaine, une année après, peu importe.

translation.en: You… you have, um, a… There's a time gap.
translation.fr: Il y a un intervalle de temps.

translation.en: And in that time gap,
translation.fr: Et dans cet intervalle,

translation.en: you actually experience the forces of healing, of recovery.
translation.fr: tu as pu bénéficierdes forces de la guérison.

translation.en: Yeah, I… I haven't looked at this picture
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas regardé cette photo

translation.en: in four years.
translation.fr: en quatre ans.

translation.en: But I, like, printed it out, because I wanted to show you and look at it.
translation.fr: Mais je l'ai imprimée,pour qu'on la regarde.

translation.en: You haven't looked at it for four years? [Jonah] No.
translation.fr: - Tu ne l'as pas regardée en quatre ans ?- Non.

translation.en: In a good way…
translation.fr: D'une façon positive…

translation.en: it's like it's… I look stripped of everything fake.
translation.fr: j'ai l'air dépourvu de tout artifice.

translation.en: And there is an oddly serene look on my face.
translation.fr: - Mon visage a l'air étrangement serein.- Oui.

translation.en: -[Stutz] There is. -Which is, like, so bizarre.
translation.fr: C'est très bizarre.

translation.en: But maybe because it, like, demolished…
translation.fr: Peut-être parce quetout ce qui était sans importance…

translation.en: everything that didn't matter.
translation.fr: avait été balayé.

translation.en: [Stutz] It demolished everything you thought you needed but you don't need.
translation.fr: Oui ça a balayé tout ce donttu pensais avoir besoin à tort.

translation.en: That's the picture of somebody who's gone through hell
translation.fr: C'est la photo de quelqu'unqui a traversé l'enfer

translation.en: and came out the other side and is really okay,
translation.fr: et qui s'en est sorti, qui va bien,

translation.en: in a very nondramatic way, which I like.
translation.fr: d'une façon non dramatique, ce que j'aime.

translation.en: That's a picture of victory, even though it might not look like it.
translation.fr: C'est une photo de victoire,même si ça n'en a pas l'air.

translation.en: Loss Processing is a tool that allows you to process loss, right?
translation.fr: La Gestion d'une Perte, c'est l'outilqui permet de gérer une perte, d'accord ?

translation.en: And most people are very bad at it.
translation.fr: La plupart des gens ont du mal.

translation.en: Not only are they bad when there's a loss and they get depressed or bereft,
translation.fr: Non seulement ils ont du malet ils sont déprimés et perdus,

translation.en: but before there's a loss, they're just worrying about a loss.
translation.fr: mais avant même cette perte,ils la craignent.

translation.en: The goal of this is to get what's called the potency of nonattachment.
translation.fr: Le but étant d'atteindreune capacité de non-attachement.

translation.en: That means I can pursue something, but I'm willing not to have it.
translation.fr: C'est le fait de vouloir une chose,mais d'être prêt à ne pas l’avoir.

translation.en: I still wanna pursue it. I want to pursue it really hard.
translation.fr: Je ferai quand même tout pour l'avoir.

translation.en: But I'm also willing to lose.
translation.fr: Mais j'accepterai l'échec.

translation.en: The first thing I want you to do is pick out something that you feel you've become too attached to.
translation.fr: Tout d’abord, choisis quelque choseauquel tu te sens trop attaché.

translation.en: It could be a person, a job, something small. It doesn't matter.
translation.fr: Ça peut être une personne,un emploi, un objet. Peu importe.

translation.en: But something where you're loath to let go of it.
translation.fr: Mais quelque choseque tu détesterais ne plus avoir.

translation.en: You're afraid, if you let go of it, something terrible's gonna happen.
translation.fr: Tu as peur que, si tu ne l'as plus,quelque chose d'horrible arrive.

translation.en: -You have it? -Mm-hmm.
translation.fr: C'est bon ?

translation.en: [Stutz] Okay.
translation.fr: D'accord.

translation.en: Now imagine you're grasping this thing.
translation.fr: Imagine que tu saisis cette chose.

translation.en: And if it's not a material thing, it doesn't matter.
translation.fr: Peu importe que ça soit matériel ou non.

translation.en: Just imagine you're grasping it,
translation.fr: Imagine juste que tu la saisis,

translation.en: like you're grasping onto a branch on a tree.
translation.fr: comme si tu t'accrochaisà la branche d'un arbre.

translation.en: It's scary. You're afraid to let go.
translation.fr: C'est effrayant. Tu as peur de lâcher.

translation.en: But you let go anyway.
translation.fr: Mais tu le fais.

translation.en: And when you let go, you start to fall.
translation.fr: Et quand tu lâches, tu tombes.

translation.en: It's not a bad sensation though.
translation.fr: Mais ce n'est pas désagréable.

translation.en: The falling is actually kind of slow and gentle, to your surprise,
translation.fr: La chute est plutôt lente et douce,à ta plus grande surprise,

translation.en: but you're dropping down.
translation.fr: mais tu tombes.

translation.en: And you say, "I'm willing to lose everything."
translation.fr: Et tu te dis,"Je suis prêt à tout perdre."

translation.en: And you have to say it silently,
translation.fr: Dis-le dans ta tête.

translation.en: but you want to really feel the, uh, intent behind that.
translation.fr: Dis-le dans ta tête. Tu dois vraiment sentirle sens de cette phrase.

translation.en: And the moment you say that,
translation.fr: Au moment où tu te le dis,

translation.en: you hit the surface of a sun that was down there below you,
translation.fr: tu touches la surface d’un soleilqui était en dessous de toi

translation.en: and your body burns up.
translation.fr: et ton corps brûle.

translation.en: Now, at that point, you have lost everything,
translation.fr: À ce stade, tu as tout perdu,

translation.en: because the instrument of possession is your physical body.
translation.fr: parce que la possessionpasse par ton corps.

translation.en: So if your physical body's burnt up, you're just one sunbeam
translation.fr: Donc si ton corps brûle,tu n'es plus qu'un rayon de soleil

translation.en: amongst all these other sunbeams.
translation.fr: parmi tous les autres rayons de soleil.

translation.en: You're radiating outward in all directions,
translation.fr: Tu rayonnes dans toutes les directions,

translation.en: and what you're radiating is a very loving, giving, outflowing sensation.
translation.fr: et ce que tu irradies, c'est une sensationd’amour, de partage, de fluidité.

translation.en: And then you look around,
translation.fr: Et tu regardes autour de toi,

translation.en: and you see, all around you, an infinite number of other suns,
translation.fr: tu vois un nombre infini d'autres soleils,

translation.en: just like the one you're inside of, all of which are radiating outwards.
translation.fr: comme celui dans lequel tu es,ils rayonnent dans toutes les directions.

translation.en: And then you hear the suns, all of them, saying in unison,
translation.fr: Et tu entends les soleils, à l'unisson,

translation.en: "We are everywhere."
translation.fr: "Nous sommes partout."

translation.en: This world is called a sun world.
translation.fr: Ce monde est appelé le monde du soleil.

translation.en: All you can do is give. You can't take.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux faire que donner,tu ne prends rien.

translation.en: You can't grasp. You can't hold on to anything. It's just impossible.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux rien saisir,ni t'accrocher à rien, impossible.

translation.en: Now you can open your eyes.
translation.fr: Tu peux rouvrir les yeux.

translation.en: How'd it feel?
translation.fr: Comment te sens-tu ?

translation.en: [Jonah] Great.
translation.fr: Très bien.

translation.en: -You don't wanna say anything else? -Yeah, I do.
translation.fr: - Autre chose à dire ?- Oui.

translation.en: Which is, I'm very good at nonattachment
translation.fr: Je suis très bon en non-attachement

translation.en: to, like, a job or an identity or a beef with someone.
translation.fr: que ça concerne un boulot, une identité,ou une dispute avec quelqu’un.

translation.en: I can get there and use the tools to get there.
translation.fr: Je sais utiliser cet outil pour ça.

translation.en: When it comes to things like a romantic relationship
translation.fr: Mais quand il s'agitde relation sentimentale,

translation.en: or a family member that I love,
translation.fr: ou d'un proche que j'aime,

translation.en: the idea of losing those things,
translation.fr: l'idée de les perdre,

translation.en: I struggle with that concept.
translation.fr: j'ai beaucoup de mal.

translation.en: Think about it like this. You're not trying to become nonattached.
translation.fr: Vois-le comme ça. Tu n’essaies pasde ne plus avoir d'attaches.

translation.en: You're trying to move towards nonattachment
translation.fr: Tu essaies d’aller vers le non-attachement

translation.en: every time you get scared of a loss.
translation.fr: chaque fois que tu as peur d'une perte.

translation.en: For most people,
translation.fr: La plupart des gens

translation.en: they've never been nonattached for one second in their whole life.
translation.fr: n'ont jamais été sans attachesune seule seconde de leur vie.

translation.en: So even the fact that they can move towards that is… is helpful for them.
translation.fr: Rien que l'idéede s'en approcher peut les aider.

translation.en: If you're human, it's not possible.
translation.fr: En tant qu'humain, c'est impossible.

translation.en: It wouldn't even be good if you were totally nonattached.
translation.fr: Ça ne serait pas bonde n'avoir aucune attache.

translation.en: That makes a lot of sense.
translation.fr: C'est logique.

translation.en: So the goal is not to become completely nonattached. No.
translation.fr: Donc le but n'est pasde ne pas avoir d'attaches.

translation.en: It's work towards no one person, place, or thing leaving you
translation.fr: C'est de travailler sur le fait que situ perds quelqu'un ou quelque chose,

translation.en: can completely take away your whole existence
translation.fr: ça n'annihilera pas ton existence,

translation.en: and your sense of wholeness.
translation.fr: ou ton sentiment de plénitude.

translation.en: That's correct.
translation.fr: C'est ça.

translation.en: I don't wanna leave anything in the shadows,
translation.fr: Je ne veux rien laisser dans l'ombre,

translation.en: because I don't want it to become this, like, thing that eats at me.
translation.fr: parce que je ne veux pasque ces choses me hantent.

translation.en: And even your fears, I think, when you say them,
translation.fr: Même nos peurs,

translation.en: or your pain, when you say it, does set you free in a lot of ways. [Stutz] Yeah, it does.
translation.fr: ou nos souffrances, quand on les exprime,peuvent être libératrices.

translation.en: [Jonah] And I use Loss Processing, and it really helps.
translation.fr: Et j'utilise la Gestion d'une Perte,ça m'aide vraiment.

translation.en: I wanna be like a monk and be like, "These tools just help it all dissolve,"
translation.fr: J'aimerais pouvoir dire,"Ces outils résolvent tout,"

translation.en: but I still feel that pain every day.
translation.fr: mais je ressens encore la douleur.

translation.en: -You know? -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu comprends ?- Oui.

translation.en: [Jonah] I still miss my brother.
translation.fr: Mon frère me manque.

translation.en: [Stutz] Yeah, you will for a very long time.
translation.fr: Oui, ça sera le cas pendant longtemps.

translation.en: But let me put it this way.
translation.fr: Mais laisse-moi te dire.

translation.en: Death is not a permanent condition.
translation.fr: La mort n'est pas un état permanent.

translation.en: You can… you can be afraid of death, that's fine,
translation.fr: Tu peux en avoir peur, pas de souci,

translation.en: as long as you feel something after death.
translation.fr: tant que tu ressensqu'il y a quelque chose après.

translation.en: And that's rebirth.
translation.fr: La renaissance.

translation.en: The idea that rebirth is possible from the very worst,
translation.fr: L'idée que la renaissancedécoule du pire qui soit,

translation.en: the dregs of the world, dregs of experience,
translation.fr: le pire de ce monde, la pire expérience,

translation.en: and you can make something cyclically come alive again.
translation.fr: et qu'on revient à la vie cycliquement.

translation.en: That's the closest a human being can get to God.
translation.fr: C’est ce qui se rapproche le plus de Dieu.

translation.en: Yeah, I understand it's just a reality and that life just does go on.
translation.fr: Oui, je comprends. C’est justeune réalité et la vie continue.

translation.en: But there's very few people on that list that I just don't want to fucking lose so…
translation.fr: Mais il y a certaines personnesque je ne veux absolument pas perdre.

translation.en: I don't want to lose you either.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas te perdre non plus.

translation.en: What do I do? [chuckles]
translation.fr: Je fais quoi ?

translation.en: I think we should get married.
translation.fr: On devrait se marier.

translation.en: -I want a prenup. -[Jonah laughs]
translation.fr: Je veux un contrat de mariage.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, here we go, some of the good ones. These are so sick.
translation.fr: - Oh, oui, voilà.- Ils sont incroyables.

translation.en: [Stutz] Yeah, this…
translation.fr: Oui.

translation.en: [Jonah] One of the things that this movie is accomplishing for me while I'm making it
translation.fr: Une des choses que je réaliseen faisant ce documentaire,

translation.en: is that I used to think that the people I look up to
translation.fr: c'est que je pensaisque les gens que j'admirais

translation.en: are absolved of the problems that I have.
translation.fr: étaient exemptsdes problèmes que je rencontrais.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm sorry.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé.

translation.en: I understand. I under--
translation.fr: Je comprends.

translation.en: [Jonah] It's absurd. I know. It really is absurd. It's not…
translation.fr: C'est absurde. Je sais.Vraiment absurde. Ce n'est pas…

translation.en: -You're laughing 'cause it's absurd. -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu ris parce que c'est absurde.- Oui.

translation.en: Right. And I think it's good for people to see
translation.fr: Oui. Et je penseque c'est bien de montrer aux gens

translation.en: that you, for me, are someone who's created these things,
translation.fr: que pour moi,tu es le créateur de ces choses,

translation.en: and I think it's important that people who we look up to
translation.fr: et c'est important de comprendreque les gens qu'on admire

translation.en: aren't exempt from all the problems that we ourselves have.
translation.fr: connaissent les même problèmes que nous.

translation.en: You are still in the struggle and in the fight of being a human
translation.fr: Tu te bats en tant qu'être humain

translation.en: just like everybody else is.
translation.fr: comme tout le monde.

translation.en: Your whole thing is that you're never exempt from the pain
translation.fr: Tu n'échappes pas à la douleur,

translation.en: or the uncertainty or the constant work.
translation.fr: l'incertitude, ou le travail.

translation.en: And I think there's something beautiful about seeing your vulnerability,
translation.fr: Et je trouve ça beaude voir ta vulnérabilité,

translation.en: for me, that dissects that there will never be anyone that has it all figured out.
translation.fr: ça me montre que personnen'a toutes les clés.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.fr: Oui.

translation.en: That's the secret of life.
translation.fr: C'est le secret de la vie.

translation.en: -As far as I'm concerned. -Is what?
translation.fr: - En ce qui me concerne.- Quoi ?

translation.en: [Stutz] Accepting that you won't figure it out ever. Nobody else will figure it out.
translation.fr: Accepter de ne pas avoir toutes les clés.Que personne ne les a.

translation.en: Happiness depends on how you accept that
translation.fr: Le bonheur dépendde l'acceptation de cela,

translation.en: and what you do about it.
translation.fr: et de ce que tu en fais.

translation.en: But first is accept it, because if you don't accept it,
translation.fr: Mais en premier lieu,il faut l'accepter parce que sinon,

translation.en: you have this thing in your mind that I can get over it
translation.fr: ça reste bloqué dans ton esprit

translation.en: or under it and eliminate it, and you can't.
translation.fr: et tu ne peux pas t'en débarrasser.

translation.en: This is such a great moment right now.
translation.fr: C'est un beau moment.

translation.en: Could you guys stay just like this, and I'm gonna go home and go to sleep?
translation.fr: Est-ce que vous pouvez rester comme ça,et moi, je rentre dormir chez moi ?

translation.en: When I get back here in the morning, I want to find you just…
translation.fr: Quand je reviens demain matin,je veux que vous…

translation.en: -Would that be reasonable? -[Jonah] Yeah.
translation.fr: - C'est faisable ?- Oui.

translation.en: Are you tired?
translation.fr: Tu es fatigué ?

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm kind of tired. -[Jonah] All right, go lay down.
translation.fr: - Oui, un peu.- D'accord, va t'allonger.

translation.en: What do you see when you close your eyes?
translation.fr: Que vois-tu en fermant les yeux ?

translation.en: I see an ocean.
translation.fr: Je vois un océan.

translation.en: And it's a beautiful beach, and the waves are--
translation.fr: Une belle plage et les vagues sont…

translation.en: They're not huge waves. They're just perfectly formed waves.
translation.fr: Elle ne sont pas énormes,elles sont parfaites.

translation.en: And they're running up and down my body now.
translation.fr: Je suis dedans maintenant.

translation.en: [Jonah] Is the water warm or cold?
translation.fr: L'eau est bonne ?

translation.en: Warm.
translation.fr: Oui.

translation.en: You know what my mother said when my brother, um, went into the hospital?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que ma mère a ditquand mon frère est allé à l'hôpital ?

translation.en: She said, "He went… he… he entered it as an infant," or, you know, he was three,
translation.fr: Elle a dit, "Il est entréen tant qu'enfant," il avait trois ans,

translation.en: "but three months later," I think it was three months later when he died,
translation.fr: "mais trois mois plus tard,"je crois qu'il est mort trois mois après,

translation.en: "he was a grown man."
translation.fr: "c'était un adulte."

translation.en: So something… He was transformed.
translation.fr: Donc… Il a été transformé.

translation.en: It made me feel so, um, sad, but also,
translation.fr: Ça m'a rendu très triste, mais aussi…

translation.en: Also in awe, I guess.
translation.fr: ça m'a impressionné, je crois.

translation.en: -[Jonah] Can you see him now? -[exhales] What?
translation.fr: - Tu le vois, là ?- Quoi ?

translation.en: [Jonah] You see him now?
translation.fr: Tu le vois ?

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, it's… He… he's not particularly--
translation.fr: Oui, il n'est pas…

translation.en: I feel that that is my brother, but, you know, he feels like…
translation.fr: Je sens que c'est mon frère,mais on dirait…

translation.en: He feels like he's your age, actually.
translation.fr: On dirait qu'il a ton âge.

translation.en: He says… [inhales]
translation.fr: Il dit

translation.en: …he didn't give me enough advance warning about his death.
translation.fr: qu'il ne m'a pas prévenu de sa mort.

translation.en: He's saying…
translation.fr: Il dit…

translation.en: He's saying it didn't bother him that much. He… he knew about it.
translation.fr: Il dit que ça ne l'a pastrop dérangé. Il était au courant.

translation.en: I don't see how he could have… told me.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pas comment il aurait pu me le dire.

translation.en: Maybe. I don't know.
translation.fr: Peut-être. Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: I swear, I know this is impossible, but I'm having this feeling
translation.fr: Vraiment, je sais que c'est impossible,mais j'ai l'impression

translation.en: as if I'm flying.
translation.fr: d'être en train de voler.

translation.en: [Jonah] How does it feel?
translation.fr: C'est comment ?

translation.en: Great.
translation.fr: Génial.

translation.en: Can I, uh, sit up?
translation.fr: Je peux m'asseoir ?

translation.en: [Jonah] You're flying through the air?
translation.fr: Tu voles dans les airs ?

translation.en: Well, I'm… I'm hoping that'll stop when my feet…
translation.fr: J'espère que ça va s'arrêterquand mes pieds…

translation.en: [splutters] Are you insured for that?
translation.fr: Tu es assuré pour ça ?

translation.en: -[Jonah laughs] Yeah, you wanna sit up? -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Oui, tu veux t'asseoir ?- Oui.

translation.en: [Jonah] Yeah, sit up. Of course.
translation.fr: Oui, assieds-toi.

translation.en: -This is a nice room. -[Jonah laughs]
translation.fr: Cette pièce est sympa.

translation.en: Wow.
translation.fr: Waouh.

translation.en: This is the real challenge for me every day, is to get out of bed.
translation.fr: C'est mon défi quotidien, sortir du lit.

translation.en: Maybe it's just an attempt to gain control over me or…
translation.fr: Peut-être que tu veux avoirun peu de contrôle sur moi…

translation.en: I'm not sure. Why did you?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: [Jonah] All those reasons.
translation.fr: Pour toutes ces raisons.

translation.en: -Should somebody grab your medicine? -Yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu veux tes médicaments ?- Oui.

translation.en: I like the background the way it is,
translation.fr: J'aime le fond comme ça,

translation.en: because a lot of people have dreams
translation.fr: parce que beaucoup de gens rêvent

translation.en: where they… they have… they discover another bedroom in their house,
translation.fr: qu'ils découvrentune autre chambre dans leur maison,

translation.en: or sometimes they'll discover, like, a whole huge thing.
translation.fr: ou parfois, ils découvrent un truc énorme.

translation.en: What it really means in the dream world is you're becoming more conscious.
translation.fr: Et ce que ça signifie,c'est que tu deviens plus conscient.

translation.en: Your view of the universe is expanding.
translation.fr: Ta vision de l'univers s'agrandit.

translation.en: So people have dreams that there's a room in their house that's not there,
translation.fr: Les gens rêvent qu'il y a une piècedans leur maison qui n'existe pas,

translation.en: and it means their mind is expanding or they're growing?
translation.fr: et ça signifie que leur esprit grandit ?

translation.en: Yeah. Mm-hmm.
translation.fr: Oui.

translation.en: That's crazy.
translation.fr: C'est fou.

translation.en: …won't recover. I say, "Do what the fuck I tell you."
translation.fr: …pas s'en sortir.Je dis, "Faites ce que je vous dis."

translation.en: "Do exactly what I tell you. I guarantee you'll feel better."
translation.fr: "Exactement tout ce que je dis.Je vous garantis que vous irez mieux."

translation.en: [Jonah] Wait, I have an idea.
translation.fr: Attends, j'ai une idée.

translation.en: Yeah, go ahead.
translation.fr: Oui, je t'écoute.

translation.en: [Jonah] Since we already shot the opening of the movie,
translation.fr: Comme on a déjà le début du film,

translation.en: this might be for the end of the movie,
translation.fr: ça pourrait être pour la fin,

translation.en: if we're saying why I made this movie now, after all we've been through.
translation.fr: on dit pourquoi j'ai fait ce documentaire,après tout ce qu'on a traversé.

translation.en: That's good.
translation.fr: C'est bien.

translation.en: See if you can… just really fast,
translation.fr: Voyons si tu peux… Vite fait.

translation.en: see if you can say the beginning, and then, right after that, say the end.
translation.fr: Voyons si tu peux dire le début,et juste après, tu dis la fin.

translation.en: I'm making this movie
translation.fr: Je fais ce film

translation.en: because I want to give therapy and the tools I've learned in therapy
translation.fr: parce que je veux offrir la thérapie,et les outils que j'ai connus en thérapie,

translation.en: to as many people as possible through a film.
translation.fr: à un maximum de gens.

translation.en: I made this movie
translation.fr: J'ai fait ce film

translation.en: because I love Phil…
translation.fr: parce que j'aime Phil…

translation.en: because I love the life these tools allowed for me to have.
translation.fr: Parce que j'aime la vieque ces outils m'ont permis d'avoir.

translation.en: And it doesn't matter what people think about the movie.
translation.fr: Et peu importe ceque les gens penseront du film.

translation.en: It just matters that we finished it.
translation.fr: Ce qui compte, c'est qu'on l'ait fini.

translation.en: Together.
translation.fr: Ensemble.

translation.en: Yeah, I feel closer to you now than when we started,
translation.fr: Oui. Je me sens plus prochede toi aujourd'hui qu'au début,

translation.en: which I think is a great sign.
translation.fr: je pense que c'est bon signe.

translation.en: It's also great luck for me, you know, at age 74.
translation.fr: C'est aussi une chance pour moi, à 74 ans.

translation.en: I love you.
translation.fr: Je t'aime.

translation.en: I love you.
translation.fr: Je t'aime.

translation.en: I still wish you would stop dumping so much shit on me.
translation.fr: J'aimerais que tu arrêtesde me balancer toute cette merde.

translation.en: ♪ The last long day she said goodbye ♪ ♪ Well, Lord, I thought I would cry ♪
translation.fr: À NOS FRÈRES

translation.en: [Jonah] When we shot, like, months ago,
translation.fr: Quand on a tourné, il y a des mois,

translation.en: you had mentioned a relationship that was kind of on and off for a long time,
translation.fr: tu as mentionné une relationqui dure depuis longtemps

translation.en: and then you mentioned to me briefly in a phone call
translation.fr: et tu m'as rapidement dit au téléphone

translation.en: how you had reached out to that person,
translation.fr: que tu avais contacté cette personne,

translation.en: and I wanna ask you about it but only if you wanna talk about it.
translation.fr: et je voudrais en savoir plus,si tu veux bien en parler.

translation.en: It's so amazing.
translation.fr: C'est génial.

translation.en: This is-- She's the closest person in the world to me.
translation.fr: C'est la personne dontje suis le plus proche au monde.

translation.en: Mostly, when we were younger, not wanting to be in a relationship,
translation.fr: Quand nous étions plus jeuneset que nous ne voulions pas de relation,

translation.en: mostly it was me.
translation.fr: c'était surtout ma faute.

translation.en: I didn't have the will to make it work.
translation.fr: Je n'avais pas envie de faire d'efforts.

translation.en: Now I do.
translation.fr: Maintenant, si.

translation.en: -Did you reach out after our conversation? -Yeah, it actually… it helped me. Yeah.
translation.fr: - C'est grâce à notre conversation ?- Oui. Ça m'a aidé.

translation.en: -Our conversation made me a bit ashamed. -[Jonah] In what way?
translation.fr: - J'ai eu un peu honte.- Comment ça ?

translation.en: That I was doing something, like, without full commitment,
translation.fr: Je faisais quelque chosesans réel engagement,

translation.en: like in a half-assed way.
translation.fr: à moitié.

translation.en: So that was very helpful.
translation.fr: Donc ça m'a bien aidé.

translation.en: Who do you think's more scared of trying it out for real between you two?
translation.fr: Qui a le plus peur d’essayer entre vous ?

translation.en: You or her?
translation.fr: Toi ou elle ?
Oh, moi, à 100 %.

translation.en: You think you'll be able to let down some walls
translation.fr: Tu penses quetu pourrais faire tomber des murs

translation.en: and put some fears aside to try, or you want to?
translation.fr: et laisser tes peurs de côté, tu en as envie ?

translation.en: [splutters] Yeah, I'm going to. Yeah. What would be the hopeful outcome?
translation.fr: - Oui, je vais le faire.- Qu'est-ce que tu espères ?

translation.en: The hopeful outcome is it works out.
translation.fr: Que ça marche.

translation.en: That would be the hopeful outcome.
translation.fr: C'est ce que j'espère.
